what: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
title: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
text: goal roadtrafficdeaths provide dataset death certificates road traffic crashes happened Brazil, Brazilian Ministry Health. dataset provided data.table format. check variable, use ?rtdeaths.

title: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
text: can install current version roadtrafficdeaths GitHub :

title: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
code: library(roadtrafficdeaths)  str(rtdeaths) #> Classes 'data.table' and 'data.frame':   923440 obs. of  18 variables: #>  $ cod_modal          : chr  "V8" "V2" "V8" "V8" ... #>  $ modal_vitima       : chr  "Outros" "Motocicleta" "Outros" "Outros" ... #>  $ data_ocorrencia    : Date, format: "1997-01-16" "1997-10-03" ... #>  $ ano_ocorrencia     : int  1997 1997 1998 1998 1999 2000 2000 2000 2000 2001 ... #>  $ idade_vitima       : num  68 47 17 42 49 47 6 12 47 46 ... #>  $ faixa_etaria_vitima: Factor w/ 17 levels "0 a 4 anos","5 a 9 anos",..: 14 10 4 9 10 10 2 3 10 10 ... #>  $ sexo_vitima        : chr  "Masculino" "Feminino" "Masculino" "Feminino" ... #>  $ escolaridade_vitima: chr  NA "Nenhuma" NA "Nenhuma" ... #>  $ raca_vitima        : chr  NA NA "Branca" "Branca" ... #>  $ ocup_cbo_vitima    : chr  NA "62100" "00700" "62100" ... #>  $ cod_municipio_ocor : chr  "110001" "110001" "110001" "110001" ... #>  $ nome_regiao_ocor   : chr  "Norte" "Norte" "Norte" "Norte" ... #>  $ cod_municipio_res  : chr  "110001" "110001" "110001" "110001" ... #>  $ nome_regiao_res    : chr  "Norte" "Norte" "Norte" "Norte" ... #>  $ nome_uf_ocor       : chr  "Rondônia" "Rondônia" "Rondônia" "Rondônia" ... #>  $ nome_municipio_ocor: chr  "Alta Floresta D'Oeste" "Alta Floresta D'Oeste" "Alta Floresta D'Oeste" "Alta Floresta D'Oeste" ... #>  $ nome_uf_res        : chr  "Rondônia" "Rondônia" "Rondônia" "Rondônia" ... #>  $ nome_municipio_res : chr  "Alta Floresta D'Oeste" "Alta Floresta D'Oeste" "Alta Floresta D'Oeste" "Alta Floresta D'Oeste" ... #>  - attr(*, ".internal.selfref")=<externalptr>

what: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
title: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
text: Death certificates road traffic crashes. Data Brazilian Ministry Health, 1996 2021. variables encoded Brazilian Portuguese.

title: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
text: data.table 923,440 rows 18 columns: cod_modal ICD-10 code main cause death modal_vitima Mode transport victim road crash data_ocorrencia Date death ISO 8601 format ano_ocorrencia Year death idade_vitima Age years victim faixa_etaria_vitima Age range victim sexo_vitima Sex victim escolaridade_vitima Education victim raca_vitima Race victim ocup_cbo_vitima Ocupation victim, based CBO code cod_municipio_ocor City death occurrence, based IBGE code nome_regiao_ocor Brazilian region death occurred cod_municipio_res City residence victim, based IBGE code nome_regiao_res Brazilian region victim residence address nome_uf_ocor Name state death occurred nome_municipio_ocor Name city death occurred nome_uf_res Name state victim residence address nome_municipio_res Name city victim residence address

title: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
